feature.label: Dialog for DARPA ASKE
feature.description: Dialog grammar and IDE is Xtext-based and is an extension of the Semantic Application Design Language (SADL). It was developed in support of the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) ASKE Projects ANSWER and KApEESH under Agreement No. HR00111990006 and Agreement No. HR00111990007, respectively.
